info.task: navigate forwards out of a checkbox group
info.title: Navigate forwards out of a checkbox group in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstCheckbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('[role="checkbox"]').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'All condiments' checkbox, navigate to the 'Navigate backwards from here' link.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'All condiments' checkbox, navigate to the 'Navigate backwards from here' link.
instructions.mode: Ensure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Name 'Navigate backwards from here' is conveyed
